div.class: row wow animated wow animated pulse

div.p: Grab & Go Meals are ready on Mondays (meals for Monday and Tuesday) and Wednesdays (meals for Wednesday-Friday) from 10:00-12:00. They can be picked up at the HS Cafeteria Door or at the Cartwright Post Office.
The last day of school will be May 15th. The week of May 11 will be the end of the semester.

div.class: custom_666 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

div.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: center;

font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;

span.em:
Please click on your grade level for the 20-21 School Year and fill out the appropriate grade level form.
Forms must be completed by May 8th.

p.br:
*CLICK ON THE “Schools” TAB, LOCATED AT THE TOP OF THIS PAGE
*CLICK THE SCHOOL SITE WHICH THE STUDENT ATTENDS
*The link to the teacher’s webpage will be located in the left side bar.
*Click on the teacher’s name, or the grade they teach….You will then be directed to their webpage.

span.span: Please click this link to find all current 2020 Scholarships that are available.
